data.title: Rampage Trainer
data.meta_description: Rampage is a Red Dead Redemption 2 Single Player Trainer for Story Mode with lot's of useful and special features.
data.text: (nearly) ACCURATE RDR1 DUTCH 1908 tumble weed 1908 twin rocks Abigail Marston In Mary Linton's Outfits Abigail Marston In Sadie Adler's Outfits Abigail Outfits Hat Shawl and Ring Abigail-Ponytail(ALL OUTFITS) Adidas Jacket adler player home A trainer is needed Aguila Machete for story mode Alfredo Montez's Bandolier Anime Gunslinger Coat (i'm sorry boah's) Another Colter Mod Required to Spawn it in Armadillo expansion project 0.7 arthur go back for the money retreat. NEEDED FOR SPOONER AND SUCH Arthur Loft Home Arthur's favourite place Arthur's Private Luxury Penthouse In Saint Denis Needed to load the world state/IPL Arthur's Rest 0.2 BACCHUS BRIDGE STATION FURNISHED INTERIOR needed to exit Beantown Beta Duster Coat Better Chapter one Camp Better Gallows Round the Map Better Guarma Dock 1.00 This is what you need to load the Main mod. Bigger Horses either Black Ram Shotgun Coat needed to stream the YTD's Blackwater Camp MUST HAVE Blackwater City Hall Overhaul blackwater sidewalks part 1 Bonnie MacFarlane Model Swap Bounty Hunter Engraving Chapter 2 with Micah's Revolver you can install it if you want to, i highly recommend it Clean White Pants Clothing and Accessory Textures Colt 1872 Open top Colt 1878 Double-Barrel (Shorty) Colt m1878 DA Colt model 1855 carbine Concept Art-hur Cow Pattern Vest Cutter hat Davey Calender RDR2 - Before Blackwater Dirty Slut On Arthurs Hat Dutch's rings mod Elephant Rifle Elseworlds Ped(including Batman Justice League and other characters) This is necessary English Thoroughbred Not a requirement, but useful for spawning in horses immediately instead of finding them dynamically in the open world. Fussar's New Home This is what you need to load the Main mod. Gang camp in desert (location in screens) you can't get access to the mod without Rampage trainer Gang Graves Or Map Editor For Manual Load Gaptooth Ridge Cave Camp Guarma Lights Can be used to insta go there but not recommended. NEEDED to turn off the Guarma sniper HillCamp Need to use the spooner Hot Pink Tahiti Shirt house at coots chapel I'm Him This maybe needed when it comes to undressing or swapping clothing. Jack Attack Requires v1.5.1 or Later (Public) Jake Adlers Grave Javier and Dutch revolvers Fixed version Joel Miller A must have for this to work. John's deadly assassin outfit John's RDR1 duster Just Black Clothing Required Karen in Mary-Beth's Outfits Lambda Engraving for the Mauser For texture streaming [Alternatively MapEditor, but that's private] Lemat Bounty Hunter Engraving Lipizzaner Horse Breed Long hairstyles Either this, or LML LOW HONOR BANDIT ARTHUR CHAPTER 3 SAVE GAME Not required but recommended. It allows you to change cash, compendium, outfits, challenges and stuff like that Lowry's Navy Revolver To use Lowry's Revolver model/texture. Man with no name's poncho FIX for ARTHUR Mary Linton In Abigail's Outfits Mary-Beth In Abigail's Outfits Mary-Beth in Karen's Outfits MDBranth's American Quarter Horses Minecraft Steve In order to load the mod easily. Navy Revolver (Fixed) Texture and Model swap NCR Ranger Inspired Character (Optional) No More Double Chin NO MORE REST FOR UNCLE North Swedish Draft Horse This is optional, but very useful for quickly spawning in the horses you've added NPC John's Scarf Nuevo Paraiso-Mexico mod WIP Old Arthur Morgan 1919 Outfits Plus WhyEms EEE Merge patchless western coat Pete Custom Character Mod NEEDED TO CHANGE YOUR WEIGHT Play as javier Chapter 1-6 Play as Lee Van Cleef Play as micah (Epilogue Only) Playable Hosea Chapter 1-6 (REUPLOAD) Playable Sadie Adler optional but very recommended, if you want to swap to Sadie and have no problems doing so. Rampage French (Obligatoire) Rampage Traduction KOREAN Rampage Trainer - Chinese 必需 Rampage Trainer - Espanol The Trainer I'm translating Rampage Trainer - German Rampage Trainer - Polish (Not Finished) Rampage Trainer - Thai Tanslation Rampage Trainer - Traduzido para PT-BR Mod Menu que será utilizado a tradução. Rampage Trainer - Turkish Translate Rampage Trainer - ukr translation (UA) головний мод Rampage Trainer Polish Translation (finished) Rampage.Traduction Francais Red Harlow With Unique Metaped.ymt Red Hawaiian Shirt Red Hood Refined Binoculars Remington Model 1858 Reservation Camp Ribbon Tie Sadie Adler in Abigail's Outfits Sadie Adler In Karen's Outfits Sadie Adler in Mary Linton's Outfits Sadie Adler Project for changing outfits Sadie and Arthur Retreat Sadie-Ponytail(ALL OUTFITS) Saint Denis Fight Club You can use this to load the map Saint Denis Graveyard Saint Denis more street lights Scrawny Nag Changing Coats Shady Belle Extended Camp Upgrades shady_belle_upgrades.xml goes to "/<RDR2 Main Directory>/RampageFiles/Spooner/Autoload" folder Shady Belle Rework for Chapter 4 Sheriff Badge small mountain shelter for john Snowtop Snub Nosed Double action You will place these files into Rampagefiles > models so you need it. Sting (WRESTLER) Face Paint For Arthur-EXTRA CLEAN SHAVEN ONLY- street lights to fort riggs station String Tie Styled Vanilla Horses. Png or Xml for RampageTrainer. Req for xml files use Survey Corps Scout Jacket Tahiti Camp Mod (READ FULL DESC) Tahiti Dream Custom Guarma camp This is what you need to load the Main mod. The Armadillo expansion project The Player Physique Editing Template Convenient for changing Arthur's weight. And just about everything else. Three Sisters Camp Throwable Wide Blade Knife 1.0 Tiltham hat Troll Face Engraving for the Mauser For texture streaming [Alternatively MapEditor, but that's private] Undead Blackwater Required for the Undead Nightmare Green weather Undead Towns Turn on the Halloween Overwide Vengeance is hereby mine on regular DA must have the Newest version of it Vests... Pants... Accessories and Such Welrod Either This, Or Lenny's mod loader. White Gambler Hat White Hat - Arthur's Hat Retexture White Worsted Coat
